text: hananim-eul dulyeowohago geubun ui yeong-gwang-eul wihae sawon-eul se-un bun-e ge eunhyega deoham-inga animyeon buseu leojin geuligo pagoedoen nang-gan-e jib-eul jieun ja-ege deoham-inyo sillo geugeos i busuwojyeo boljiog-eulo tteol-eojil geos-ini hananim-eun umaehan baegseongdeul-eul-indohaji anihasinola
